hibernate-mapping.query: select new LegalDto ( h.Id, h.AcctNo, h.Lno, h.Cur, h.Name, h.AType, h.LoansDesp, h.SAmt, h.SDate, h.SourceBr, h.ExpireDate, h.IntRate, h.LegalDate, h.NplDate, h.LegalCase, h.NplCase ) from LOMVIW00001 as h where h.NplCase = true and h.SourceBr = :sourceBranchCode and h.Cur = :cur

select new LegalDto ( h.Id, h.AcctNo, h.Lno, h.Cur, h.Name, h.AType, h.LoansDesp, h.SAmt, h.SDate, h.SourceBr, h.ExpireDate, h.IntRate, h.LegalDate, h.NplDate, h.LegalCase, h.NplCase ) from LOMVIW00001 as h,LOMORM00013 as g where h.Lno = g.Lno and h.LegalCase = true and (g.CloseDate IS NULL OR g.CloseDate='') and CONVERT(CHAR(10),h.LegalDate,111) BETWEEN CONVERT(CHAR(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(CHAR(10),:endDate,111) and h.Cur = :cur and h.SourceBr = :sourceBranchCode

select new LegalDto ( h.Id, h.AcctNo, h.Lno, h.Cur, h.Name, h.AType, h.LoansDesp, h.SAmt, h.SDate, h.SourceBr, h.ExpireDate, h.IntRate, h.LegalDate, h.NplDate, h.LegalCase, h.NplCase ) from LOMVIW00001 as h,LOMORM00013 as g where h.Lno = g.Lno and (g.CloseDate IS Not NULL OR g.CloseDate != '') and CONVERT(CHAR(10),g.CloseDate,111) BETWEEN CONVERT(CHAR(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(CHAR(10),:endDate,111) and h.Cur = :cur and h.SourceBr = :sourceBranchCode
